      • pathForHalfedge(d: Delaunator; eid: int32; pthproc: (var Path, int32, uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float]) -> void = proc (pth: var Path; eid: int32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32; p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float]) = moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1])) lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1])) closePath(pth)): Path

        pathForRegion
      • pathForRegion(d: Delaunator; sid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path, uint32, seq[array[2, float]]) -> void = proc (pth: var Path; sid: uint32; verts: seq[array[2, float]]) = moveTo(pth, float32(verts[0][0]), float32(verts[0][1])) for v in items(verts[1 .. BackwardsIndex(1)]): lineTo(pth, float32(v[0]), float32(v[1])) closePath(pth)): Path

proc pathForCircumcenter(d: Delaunator; tid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path, uint32,
    array[2, float]) ->
    void = (pth: var Path, tid: uint32, p: array[2, float]) =>
    pth.circle(float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]), circumcenterRadius)): Path

proc pathForHalfedge(d: Delaunator; eid: int32; pthproc: (var Path, int32,
    uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; eid: int32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32;
                 p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  closePath(pth)): Path

proc pathForHullSites(d: Delaunator; pthproc: (var Path, uint32, uint32,
    array[2, float]) ->
    void = (pth: var Path, hid: uint32, pid: uint32, p: array[2, float]) =>
    pth.circle(float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]), hullSitesRadius)): Path
  Source   Edit 
proc pathForRegion(d: Delaunator; sid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path, uint32,
    seq[array[2, float]]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; sid: uint32; verts: seq[array[2, float]]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(verts[0][0]), float32(verts[0][1]))
  for v in items(verts[1 .. BackwardsIndex(1)]):
    lineTo(pth, float32(v[0]), float32(v[1]))
  closePath(pth)): Path
  Source   Edit

    void = (pth: var Path, pid: uint32, p: array[2, float]) =>
    pth.circle(float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]), centroidRadius)): Path

    array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->

                 q: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  closePath(pth)): Path

proc pathForTriangle(d: Delaunator; tid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path, uint32,
    uint32, uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; tid: uint32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32;
                 rid: uint32; p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float];
                 r: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(r[0]), float32(r[1]))
  closePath(pth)): Path
  Source   Edit

proc pathForTriangleEdges(d: Delaunator; pthproc: (var Path, uint32, int32,
    uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; tid: uint32; eid: int32; pid: uint32;
                 qid: uint32; p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  closePath(pth)): Path
  Source   Edit 
proc pathForTriangleSites(d: Delaunator; tid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path,
    uint32, uint32, uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float],
    array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; tid: uint32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32;
                 rid: uint32; p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float];
                 r: array[2, float]) =
  circle(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]), triangleSiteRadius)
  circle(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]), triangleSiteRadius)
  circle(pth, float32(r[0]), float32(r[1]), triangleSiteRadius)): Path
  Source   Edit 
proc pathsForHalfedgesAroundSite(d: Delaunator; pid: uint32; pthproc: (var Path,
    int32, uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; eid: int32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32;
                 p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  closePath(pth)): seq[Path]
  Source   Edit 
proc pathsForRegions(d: Delaunator; pthproc: (var Path, uint32,
    seq[array[2, float]]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; sid: uint32; verts: seq[array[2, float]]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(verts[0][0]), float32(verts[0][1]))
  for v in items(verts[1 .. BackwardsIndex(1)]):
    lineTo(pth, float32(v[0]), float32(v[1]))
  closePath(pth)): seq[Path]
  Source   Edit 
proc pathsForTriangles(d: Delaunator; pthproc: (var Path, uint32, uint32,
    uint32, uint32, array[2, float], array[2, float], array[2, float]) ->
    void = proc (pth: var Path; tid: uint32; pid: uint32; qid: uint32;
                 rid: uint32; p: array[2, float]; q: array[2, float];
                 r: array[2, float]) =
  moveTo(pth, float32(p[0]), float32(p[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(q[0]), float32(q[1]))
  lineTo(pth, float32(r[0]), float32(r[1]))
  closePath(pth)): seq[Path]
